Any - Annotation Type in net.usikkert.kouinject.annotation
A special qualifier annotation for specifying that a bean with any qualifier can be injected, including beans with no qualifier.

N

net.usikkert.kouinject - package net.usikkert.kouinject
Contains the classes and interfaces making up the IoC container.
net.usikkert.kouinject.annotation - package net.usikkert.kouinject.annotation
Contains the annotations used to autodetect bean meta-data.
net.usikkert.kouinject.beandata - package net.usikkert.kouinject.beandata
Contains classes describing the meta-data necessary to create and do injection in beans.
net.usikkert.kouinject.factory - package net.usikkert.kouinject.factory
Contains classes for handling user-created factories.
net.usikkert.kouinject.generics - package net.usikkert.kouinject.generics
Contains classes that helps with handling generics in the injector.
net.usikkert.kouinject.profile - package net.usikkert.kouinject.profile
Contains classes related to profiles.
net.usikkert.kouinject.util - package net.usikkert.kouinject.util
Contains utility classes.
